Join us for Cinderella's Tea Party

After the 11am show on Saturday, August 12

$8

Activities include a royal toast, decorate your own cupcake, princess bingo, make a crown, and a princess sing-a-long all with the characters from Cinderella. 

Reservations must be made in advance. Don't miss this party...your kiddos will have a royally good time! 

Hear ye, Hear Ye...A LulaRoe representative will be selling a collection of items in our Lobby before the Saturday, August 12 show of Cinderella and will also be available during intermission. A portion of the proceeds benefit Orchard Performing Arts Company in residence at Apple Hill Playhouse. Have fun shopping while supporting a great cause!
